meanings.sent1: She technicalizes the instructions for easy understanding.
meanings.sent2: He technicalizes the software to improve its performance.
meanings.sent3: The chef technicalizes the recipe by adding precise measurements.
meanings.sent4: The artist technicalizes the painting with intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The teacher technicalizes the lesson with clear explanations.

meanings.definition: To apply technical knowledge or skills.
meanings.sent1: He technicalizes his engineering expertise to solve the problem.
meanings.sent2: She technicalizes her coding skills to create innovative programs.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic technicalizes his experience to fix the car quickly.
meanings.sent4: The scientist technicalizes her research methods for accurate results.
meanings.sent5: The IT specialist technicalizes his troubleshooting techniques for efficiency.

meanings.definition: To make something technical in nature.
meanings.sent1: The company technicalizes the product to meet industry standards.
meanings.sent2: She technicalizes the presentation to include complex data analysis.
meanings.sent3: The team technicalizes the project by incorporating advanced technology.
meanings.sent4: He technicalizes the report with detailed graphs and charts.
meanings.sent5: The engineer technicalizes the design for optimal performance.
